content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Pakal samayatthe addhvaananga llil ninnu nyangallude shareeram viramikkukayum, laukikachintakallilninnu nyangallude manassu pinvaangukayum cheythukondu ee sandhyaasamayatthu shaantamaayi thirusannidhiyil nilako nd. Nithyasthuthikallum thudarchayaaya sthothrangallum ninakkarppi kkuvaanum nyangallude jeevane samrakshichu nayikkunnavanum nyangallude aathmaakkallude sahaayiyum rakshithaavumaaya ninte krpaykku sthuthi paaduvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Nyangall ninakku sthuthiyum sothravum karettunnu. Hosho...

Mrthiyaarnnore!-saubhaagyam
Ningallkkuththhaana-tthinte naallil
Ullkkondoruyirin thirumeyyum
Mochanamekum thirurakthamathum
Ningalle nirtthidum valabhaage.

Vaazhtthuka naathhane enmaname!
Mashihaaraajaave!Shokam-klesham mrthi
Yivayeshaattha-nithyajeevasthhaanatthil
Parishuddhanmaarodoppam-daasaathmaakkall
Kkaashvaasam-naathhaa!Shubhamodu nalkaname.

Kaikalluyartthikkartthaave!-ninne villichen
Nyaanennum-jeevippichu nee mrthare
Praanapradanaam nin perkkaay-sthuthi paadi
Prakhyaapikkum-veeranmaar ninnaardrathaye,

Aadaamyareyezhunnelppikkaan-cheriyavanaa-
Yorutthumgan-vinayatthodu ninniludichaan.
Nin perunaallavanoozhiyilum-svargatthilu
Munnathamaakki-nin praarththhana nyangallkkabhayam.

Mullllumaratthe dahippikkaa-thathileriyum thee
Shailatthil kandaan-darshakanaam mosha
Puthraagniyileriyaatthollaam-kanyakayaakum
Mariyaamin-drshdaantam thaanidrshyam.

Shlomo shlommo than naathhan thannil sneham
Poondoraam-nibiyarkkum shleehanmaarkkum
Shlommo than sahadenmaarkkum-shlommothan
Santaanangall-mevum-paavana sabhayathinum.

Nagaratthinnoru kottakana-kkisraayelil
Sthhaapichaan-yauseppinnasthhikall mosha
Sahadenmaare! Ningall than-asthhikallaakum
Kottayathil-kaattheedaname nyangalleyum.

Daivatthin thirunaamatthil chonnaan sodara-
Rodu yause-ppavasaanam mrthivellayathil
Misaremeennennasthhikallum pokenam
Konden priyare!-thaangum ningalle nikhileshan.

Kartthaave! Nin kaalukallil thailam pooshiya
Paapini than-kadapaapangalle nee pokki
Paaramarishdan nyaan chungka-kkaaran pol
Kenidunnu-thonnaname karallalivenmel.

Kabaru thurannu nireekshikkaam-veeranmaarum
Sundararum-nishshesham naasham poondu
Avarayyayyo mannaayi-kartthaave!
Sahathaapam nin prathiroopatthodu thonnaname.

Dharmmishdhanmaar than gaathram-thaalkkaalikamaam
Maranatthaal-nidraavishramamelkkunnu
Mannilamarnnidumaagaathram-punaruththhaana
Dinatthileneettudayone keertthicheedum.

Daivam nammodu krpacheyyum
Neethipriyaraddhvaanatthin
Phalamaarjikkum sandhyaykku
Naathhaa! Poornnamathaamanpaal
Dushdaneyaattippaayikka.

Praarththhikkumpozhuthum sandhyaa
Shushrooshayilum krpa cheyka
Nyaayattheerppinnaall ninte
Valamaayu nyangalle nirtthaname.

Vishvaasikall thannabhimaana
Bhaajanamaakum maathaave!
Nyangallilaardratha thonnaan nin
Ekaathmajanodu yaachikka.

Kanye! Munphalamaayolle!
Rakshaykkuravidamaayolle!
Ekaathmajanodarththhikka
Nyangallilaardratha thonneedaan

Ninvrtthaantam roohaayaal
Chonnoraam nibishleehanmaar
Snehaal mrtharaam sahadenmaar
Praarththhikkum krpa cheyyenam.

Kartthaavinnishdam cheythor
Nirmmalare! Praarththhichiduvin
Nyangallilninnum neengeedaan
Kopatthinnadiyum dandum,

Thommaashleehaa! Nin smarana
vaanoozhikallil nilanilppoo
Ninsmaranaye bahumaanippor
nedum thuna nin praarththhanayaal.

Muttunnu karunaanidhiye!
Yaachanayin dhvani ninvaathil
Ninnaaraadhakararppikkum
yaachanaye rodhikkaruthe.

Kelppillaatthathinaal thaangi-
Nnaahvaanam cheyyunneeshaa!
Satthamane! Ipraarththhana ke-
Ttanpaaluttharamekaname.

Naathhaa! Snaanatthin neeraal
Ninneyaninyoraam mrthare
Nin raajye valamaamkaiyyaal
Mahimaambaramaniyikkenam.

Innaallormma kazhichoraam
Mrtharaayorude naamangall
Cherttheedaname naathhaa! Nin
Raaja jeevagranthhatthil.

Punaruththhaanatthi-nnidinaadam paathaallatthil
Pongum mrthi kidilam kollllum,
Navyatha nedum-gaathrangall-mrtharaayorkkan
Pudayone!-navyatha nalkaname.

Arppichabrahaam dhoopam-
Kaazhchakallarppichaan noha
Dhoopamanachoreedaasar-
Kkaashvaasam nalkeedaname.

Vitthukallpol mannilamarnna-
mrtharodaardratha thonnaname
Khedichor modippaan nin-
Pathivathu poluyirekenam.

Koottam koottam vamsham vamsham vanneedunnu
Pettenneelokatthilninnum poyppokunnu
Kandaalum vanpaalatthingkal pantikketthi
pimpil nilpporuntitthallllum mumpanmaare.

Jeevikkumpoll daivattheppol kalppikkunnu
Jeevaantyatthil mrgamennonam maanyeedunnu
munnam naallil kartthaakkanmaar raajaakkanmaar
Innalppanmaar sthhaanabhrashdar mrthyugrasthar.

Mshihaa! Mrthyukkaasaa neengaan praarththhichone!
Randaam mrthyukkaasaa nyangallkkekeedalle.

Nyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! / Ninte karunayude vaathil nyangallude nere nee adaykkaruthe / kartthaave! Nyangall paapikallaakunnu /  ennu nyangall ettu parayunnu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.

/tkartthaave! Ninte maranatthaal / nyangallude maranam maayikkappeduvaanaayittu / ninte sneham ninte sthhaanatthuninnu nyangallude adukkalekku ninne irakkikkondu vannu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
